about_the_game:
Project Grey Cat is a Side Scroller Puzzle/Adventure/Bullet-Hell game with unique mechanics / capabilities. You are to guide a Cat through a mysterious Science Facility on a mission to Escape from this Creepy place.

You will play a cat named Grey. He is the main test subject of the "Grey Cat Project." What makes him so special is that he is as smart as a human and capable of learning human language and communication but this Facility is not so friendly. The Painful experiments get even worse for him each day, like an endless cycle. As time passes, the facility gets shut down, but Grey gets stuck in his prison cell and waits for someone to help him one day.

You, the "Player," will help him to get out of this nightmare, but you have to think about your actions because he knows you exist. The consequences will be real.

FEATURES
  • Puzzles and Battles that go beyond the Game and break the Forth wall.
  • A Soundtrack and artwork design to match the mood.
  • A unique relationship between a game character and its player.
  • Dialogues with Choices to build friendship with a sarcastic cat.
  • Four different chapters with new Gameplay mechanics and enemies.
  • Fight together with the Character in fun bullet-hell style battles.
  • Fight with unique Bosses at the end of Every Chapter.
  • Uncover the story behind this abandoned Facility.

CONTENT WARNING
Although Grey Cat is not a horror game in the traditional sense, parts of the game may include some paranoia and Depression. Please proceed with caution.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 4340 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 8500+ Series)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics / AMD Vega 8
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 x64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 8500+ Series)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 420 2gb / AMD Radeon R7 240 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
